verbs.description: [ARG0: Donald Trump ’s lawyer Rudy Giuliani] [V: says] [ARG1: his client should not testify to Robert Mueller because “ Truth is relative , ” and “ They may have a different version of the truth than we do] . ”
Donald Trump ’s lawyer Rudy Giuliani says his client [V: should] not testify to Robert Mueller because “ Truth is relative , ” and “ They may have a different version of the truth than we do . ”

Donald Trump ’s lawyer Rudy Giuliani says [ARG0: his client] [ARGM-MOD: should] [ARGM-NEG: not] [V: testify] [ARG2: to Robert Mueller] [ARGM-CAU: because “ Truth is relative] , ” and “ They may have a different version of the truth than we do . ”

Donald Trump ’s lawyer Rudy Giuliani says his client should not testify to Robert Mueller because “ [ARG1: Truth] [V: is] [ARG2: relative] , ” and “ They may have a different version of the truth than we do . ”
Donald Trump ’s lawyer Rudy Giuliani says his client should not testify to Robert Mueller because “ Truth is relative , ” and “ They [V: may] have a different version of the truth than we do . ”

Donald Trump ’s lawyer Rudy Giuliani says his client should not testify to Robert Mueller because “ Truth is relative , ” and “ [ARG0: They] [ARGM-MOD: may] [V: have] [ARG1: a different version of the truth than we do] . ”
Donald Trump ’s lawyer Rudy Giuliani says his client should not testify to Robert Mueller because “ Truth is relative , ” and “ They may have a different version of the truth than we [V: do] . ”
